Could you please provide a thread dump that shows where the problem is?

!SESSION Thu Jan 12 11:12:57 BRST 2006 -----------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 2006-01-12 11:12:57.247
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not find framework
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getBootPath(Main.java:635)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:272)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:973)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:948)

Can you get a couple of stack dumps right in the middle of when it is "running away" for several minutes?  Use ps to get the pid of the Java process, and then do 

kill -3 <pid>

This won't kill the process, but it will ask the VM to produce a stack dump that will appear in the eclipse directory. Attach the stack dump to this bug.
Jack do you have more details?
Closing. Please re-open if you can provide the requested information. Thanks.
